universum.studios.android.ui.widget

Class ActionButton.ItemConfigurationBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • universum.studios.android.ui.widget.ActionButton.ItemConfigurationBuilder
  • Enclosing class:
    ActionButton

    public static final class ActionButton.ItemConfigurationBuilder
extends Object
    Builder that can be used to build a new instances of ActionButton.ItemConfiguration.

    Note, that none of values that can be supplied to this builder to build a new instance of ItemConfiguration are required except the Menu that is supplied during builder's initialization.

    Author:
    Martin Albedinsky

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ItemConfigurationBuilder(Menu menu)
      Creates a new instance of ItemConfigurationBuilder with the given menu.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ActionButton.ItemConfiguration build()
      Builds a new instance of ItemConfiguration from the current data of this builder.
      ActionButton.ItemConfigurationBuilder icon(Drawable icon)
      Specifies an icon drawable for the menu item to be configured by the new ItemConfiguration.
      ActionButton.ItemConfigurationBuilder icon(int resId)
      Specifies an icon resource id for the menu item to be configured by the new ItemConfiguration.
      ActionButton.ItemConfigurationBuilder iconTint(int tint)
      Same as iconTintList(ColorStateList) where the color state list will be created from the specified tint color.
      ActionButton.ItemConfigurationBuilder iconTintList(ColorStateList tintList)
      Specifies a tint to be applied to the icon drawable specified via icon(Drawable) or one of icon resource id methods.
      ActionButton.ItemConfigurationBuilder iconTintMode(PorterDuff.Mode tintMode)
      Specifies a blending mode that should be used to apply tint specified via iconTintList(ColorStateList) to the icon drawable.
      ActionButton.ItemConfigurationBuilder itemId(int id)
      Specifies an id of the menu item to by configured by the new ItemConfiguration.
      ActionButton.ItemConfigurationBuilder reset()
      Resets this build to its initial state.
      ActionButton.ItemConfigurationBuilder vectorIcon(int resId)
      Specifies a vector icon resource id for the menu item to be configured by the new ItemConfiguration.

      • vectorIcon

        public ActionButton.ItemConfigurationBuilder vectorIcon(@DrawableRes
                                                        int resId)
        Specifies a vector icon resource id for the menu item to be configured by the new ItemConfiguration.

        Note, that if there are specified both icon and vector icon resources, the vector resource has higher priority.

        Parameters:
        resId - Resource id of the desired vector icon.
        Returns:
        This builder to allow methods chaining.
        See Also:
        icon(int), icon(Drawable)

      • icon

        public ActionButton.ItemConfigurationBuilder icon(@Nullable
                                                  Drawable icon)
        Specifies an icon drawable for the menu item to be configured by the new ItemConfiguration.

        Note, that if there are specified icon or vector icon resource ids, they will be ignored if the icon drawable is valid (non null).

        Parameters:
        icon - The desired icon drawable.
        Returns:
        This builder to allow methods chaining.
        See Also:
        icon(int), vectorIcon(int)

      • iconTint

        public ActionButton.ItemConfigurationBuilder iconTint(int tint)
        Same as iconTintList(ColorStateList) where the color state list will be created from the specified tint color.
        Parameters:
        tint - The desired single tint color.
        Returns:
        This builder to allow methods chaining.

      • iconTintList

        public ActionButton.ItemConfigurationBuilder iconTintMode(@Nullable

        Parameters:
